page.title: 17Local Amenities
page.content: {SThe Haywain Pub}Whitbread, serves lunches and meals and evening entertainment. It also has a beer Garden. {A. Alford}is an electrical engineer who works from Bartley Farm which is no longer worked as a farm. {Four Ways Stores}sells groceries and has incorporated into it a Post Office. On the wall there is Post Box built into it. {Top Fligh Equipment}is a shop which sells equestrian goods. {Coach and Horses Pub}They have a large Beer Garden and a childrens Playground. They serve morning coffee. There is a bus stop nearby. {Totton Electrical Products}a large works producing electrically powered goods. {Forest Edge Rest Home}a redgistered old peoples home
